channel.title: Making Certain Npc's not move when you attack them
channel.description: I have a line of Man's at my edge home and they have 250hp for easy training, and you can't tele or anything while fighting the men so how could I make them be unable to move?

item.title: Making Certain Npc's not move when you attack them
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

I have a line of Man’s at my edge home and they have 250hp for easy training, and you can’t tele or anything while fighting the men so how could I make them be unable to move?

Read full topic
